揭.definition: to take the lid off; to expose; to unmask

揭不開鍋.definition: to be unable to afford food

揭底.definition: to reveal the inside story; to expose sb's secrets

揭曉.definition: to announce publicly; to publish; to make known; to disclose

揭牌.definition: to unveil the plaque for (a school, shop, stadium etc); to inaugurate; to officially open

揭發.definition: to expose; to bring to light; to disclose; revelation

揭短.definition: to expose sb's faults or shortcomings

揭舉.definition: to lift up; (fig.) to put on display; to set forth; to expound

揭西.definition: Jiexi county in Jieyang 揭陽|揭阳, Guangdong

揭西縣.definition: Jiexi county in Jieyang 揭陽|揭阳, Guangdong

揭陽.definition: see 揭陽市|揭阳市[Jie1yang2 Shi4]

揭陽市.definition: Jieyang, prefecture-level city in Guangdong Province 廣東省|广东省[Guang3dong1 Sheng3]

揭露.definition: to expose; to unmask; to ferret out; to disclose; disclosure
